snippet.title: SNES Buck Rogers - The Arcade Game
snippet.description:
And then something crazy like this comes along! This is an early prototype of "Jim Power: The Lost Dimension in 3-D" when Loriciel was planning to sell the game with the Buck Rogers license. You will immediately notice differences between this and the final game, most of all the scrolling! In this version of the game, the background scroll runs correctly, without any sort of 3D gimmick that frankly always made the final game a really burden on my eyes to play. What remains the same is Chris Huelsbeck stunning soundtrack! I think I will be playing this one to completion now!

Many thanks to Manu Loewe for this prototype public release!
